title: As a User, I want players who were Eligible or Designated as a Two-Way Player to Retain Prior Season's Designation
custom_steps:
- If a player, who had become eligible or was designated as a two-way player, is removed from the 40-man roster prior to accruing an active day of service and is then added back to the roster, he will retain the prior season's status/designation.

Example:
 - Two-Way player is removed from the roster prior to Opening Day.  He is added back to the roster on April 20th.  When he is added back he will default to a Two-Way player with the same positions he had the prior season.

title: As a User, I want the TWP Widget to have data when it rolls over to a new year
custom_steps:
Related to #169320999.

AC:
 - When the widget rolls over, the player population and positions will roll over as well.
 - If a player was Eligible in the prior season, his Eligible status will be carried over
 - If a player was Designated as a Two-Way Player in the prior season, his designation and two-way position will be carried forward

title: As a User, I want player profile headers updated to account for TWP
custom_steps:
Wire: https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=info

AC:
 - In the header of non 40-man players, and 40-man players who have not been designated as Two-Way Player, the position field label will appear as 'Pos'
  -- There will only be one position displayed
  -- The position will be Pos from the baseball info section

*(scroll to the right on the wire)*
 - In the header of 40-man players who have been designated as a two-way player, the position field label will appear as "Pos/TWP"
  -- There will be two positions displayed
  -- The first position will be Pos from the baseball info section
  -- The second position will be TWP Pos from the baseball info section

title: As a User, I want Baseball Info section on player profiles updated to account for TWP
custom_steps:
Wire: https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=info

AC:
 - The Baseball Info section of Profiles for 40-man players will be updated to include the following:
  -- Pos
  -- TWP Pos
  -- Stats Pos
  -- Two-Way Player
 - Two-Way Player will be a flag / checkbox
 - For 40-Man players, these fields will only be editable by BOC Admins
 - TWP Pos will only be visible/editable if Two-Way Player flag is set
 - TWP Pos will be required if Two-Way Player flag is set

title: As a User, I want the Active MJ Roster Limit to be increased to 26
custom_steps:
AC:
 - The MJ Roster Maximum will be increased from 25 to 26
 - Roster Summary Screens will be updated for the count to be green at 26 and turn red at 27 and above
 - The Roster notification batch will be updated to create notifications if roster counts are over the new limit
 - Any rule checks that check against MJ roster limits will be updated to account for the new limits

title: As a User, I want new max Roster Limits for September
custom_steps:
AC:
 - A new September Max of 28 will be created in the LOP Lookup
 - From the Roster Expansion Date (system date) through the end of the season, the max active roster limit for MJ Rosters will be 28
 - The Under Control limit will remain 40
 - If the Active Count is anything other than 28, the number will turn red on the roster summary screens
 -  The Roster notification batch will be updated to create notifications if active roster counts are anything other than 28 during September
 - Any rule checks that check against MJ roster limits will be updated to account for the new limits

title: As a User, I want to create a new Appointment of 27th Man for a player
custom_steps:
Related to: #115265699

AC:
 - A new Appointment of 27th Man transaction will be created as a result of increasing the Roster Limits
 - This new transaction should work the same way as the Appointment of 26th Man transaction
 - The existing Appointment of 26th Man transaction will be hidden / archived
  -- Will be maintained historically, but will no longer be able to be created

title: As a User, I want to create a new Return of 27th Man for a player
custom_steps:
Related to: #115265883

AC:
 - A new Return of 27th Man transaction will be created as a result of increasing the Roster Limits
 - This new transaction should work the same way as the Return of 26th Man transaction
 - The existing Return of 26th Man transaction will be hidden / archived
  -- Will be maintained historically, but will no longer be able to be created

title: Other 27th Man Transactions
custom_steps:
Related to: #113792721

Update labels / text to account for new 27th Man

 - Reinstate as 27th Man
 - Take off roster as 27th Man

title: As a User, I want players optioned to ST Facilities to receive an option days as well as service days
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a player is optioned to a ST Facility after their Club's season is over, they should receive Optioned Days as well as MJ Service days

title: As a User, I want Option Tracking Batch updated for players optioned to ST Facilities
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Update option tracking batch to count the new days towards the total option days, but to not give them back as service if the total is less than 20 days

title: Investigate if MN FA Batches Need to be Updated
custom_steps: Do we need to make updates to the MN FA batches to handle the new status in September?  This will now be an active mn club.

title: As a User, I want Roster Affected types on DFA Transactions updated with new rosters
custom_steps:
AC:
 - On Designate for Assignment transactions, the Roster Affected section will be update with the new rosters:
  -- 25-Man option will become 26-man
  -- 28-Man will be added, this option will only be active between the Roster Expansion date and the end of the season

title: As a User, I want to Pitcher Limits added to MJ Rosters
custom_preconds: GIVEN User want to see "Pitcher Limit" count added to MJ Rosters
custom_steps: WHEN  user is viewing "Pitcher" count on MJ Rosters
custom_expected:
AC:
 - From Opening Day to the day before the roster expansion date, the maximum number of pitchers allowed on a MJ Active Roster is 13
 - From the roster expansion date to the end of the season, the maximum number of pitchers allowed on a MJ Active Roster is 14
 - These values should be easily configurable on the system values screen (LRD Tab)
  -- Number of Pitchers
  -- Number of Pitchers After Expansion
 - The pitcher count on the Roster Summary screen should turn Red if the number of pitchers on the Active MJ roster is greater than the applicable number
 - The Roster notification batch should be updated to generate notifications if a club has more than the allowable number of pitchers
 - Two-Way player count as position players

title: I want to see warnings if I create a transaction that will put me over the pitcher limit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user wants to see an error message when passing the allowable limit of pitchers on roster
AND   users Club pitcher roster count is at Max capacity
custom_steps: WHEN  user adds player to roster that will put club over pitcher limit count
custom_expected:
THEN  the system will return an overridable warning
AND   warning will also be included in Two-Way Player widget

title: As a User, I want Reports that include roster counts to display a break down by position
custom_steps:
AC:
 - Any ML Report that includes roster counts (below), should show a breakdown of Pitchers and Non-Pitchers following Total Active
  -- i.e. Total Active - 26  Total Pitchers - 13  Total Non-Pitchers  - 13  Total Under Control - 40

  -- MJ Roster
  -- PIS 
  -- Opening Day Roster
  -- Post Season Eligibility Roster
  -- Wild Card roster
  -- Division Series Roster
  -- LCS Roster
  -- World Series Roster
  -- Reserve List
  -- Reserve List Submission
  -- Roster Detail
  -- Roster Number Breakdown (Already shows players vs pitchers, but will need to be adjusted )
  -- Org Chart
